title: Identifying Suspicious URLs: An Application of Large-Scale Online Learning

author: Justin Ma, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, UC San Diego

segmentation: So I'm actually a systems person by training.

Mr. Home, which is that of protecting web users from visiting malicious URLs.
